Interface VirtualServerRMI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, VirtualServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer
public interface VirtualServerRMI extends Remote, VirtualServer

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect(VirtualViewRMI client, UUID uuid, String username) throws RemoteException
      Establishes a connection between the server and a client.
      Parameters:
      client - the client object that implements the VirtualViewRMI interface, representing the client side of the connection
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the client to identify the session
      username - the username of the client, used for session identification and interaction
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • createGame

      void createGame(int level, UUID id, int Numplayers, String Nickname) throws Exception
      Creates a new game with the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      level - the difficulty level of the game
      id - the unique identifier for the game
      Numplayers - the number of players in the game
      Nickname - the nickname of the initiating player
      Throws:
      Exception - if game creation fails

    • JoinGame

      void JoinGame(String NickName, int NumOfPlayers, UUID id, UUID old) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to join an existing game on the virtual server.
      Specified by:
      JoinGame in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      NickName - the nickname of the player attempting to join the game
      NumOfPlayers - the number of players expected in the game
      id - the unique identifier of the game the player wants to join
      old - the unique identifier of the player's previous game, if applicable
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call

      Activates a timer for a specific player in the game session identified by the given UUID.

      activateTimer in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - the username of the player for whom the timer is being activated
      id - the unique identifier of the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related exception occurs during the execution of the remote method

    • insertTile

      void insertTile(int row, int col, int playerID, int rotation, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Inserts a tile into the game board at the specified row and column with the given rotation. This method associates the inserted tile with a specific player and game identified by the given UUID.
      Specified by:
      insertTile in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      row - The row index where the tile should be placed on the game board.
      col - The column index where the tile should be placed on the game board.
      playerID - The ID of the player performing the tile insertion.
      rotation - The rotation of the tile, represented as an integer.
      id - The unique identifier for the game session in which the action is taking place.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs during the execution of the remote method.

    • chooseOneSubShip

      void chooseOneSubShip(int index, int playerID, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose a specific sub-ship during gameplay. This method is implemented on the server side and called by the client to interact with the game involving sub-ships selection.
      Specified by:
      chooseOneSubShip in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the sub-ship to be chosen.
      playerID - The ID of the player making the selection.
      id - The unique identifier of the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication issue occurs.

    • acceptToLandOnAPlanet

      void acceptToLandOnAPlanet(String p, boolean yOn, int NumPlanet, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to accept or decline the option to land on a planet within the game.
      Specified by:
      acceptToLandOnAPlanet in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      p - The identifier of the player making the decision.
      yOn - A boolean indicating whether the player accepts (true) or declines (false) the option to land on the planet.
      NumPlanet - The identifier of the planet on which the player may land.
      id - The unique game session identifier associated with the current action.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs during the remote invocation.

    • chooseAbandonedStation

      void chooseAbandonedStation(String player, boolean yOn, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> storageTiles, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> newGoods, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose an abandoned station during the game. This method handles the selection process for abandoned stations, which may involve updating the storage tiles and adding new goods for the player.
      Specified by:
      chooseAbandonedStation in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player making the selection.
      yOn - a boolean flag for additional criteria or conditions for the selection.
      storageTiles - an ArrayList of ArrayLists representing the storage tiles for the game.
      newGoods - an ArrayList of ArrayLists containing the new goods associated with the selection.
      id - the unique identifier of the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs during method invocation.

    • chooseCannonBatteryPos

      void chooseCannonBatteryPos(String player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> cannonPos, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesPos, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows the player to choose positions for cannon batteries during the gameplay.
      Specified by:
      chooseCannonBatteryPos in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - The username or identifier of the player making the selection.
      cannonPos - The list of possible positions for cannons, represented as a 2D array of integers.
      batteriesPos - The list of possible positions for batteries, represented as a 2D array of integers.
      id - The unique identifier of the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an issue during the remote method invocation.

    • chooseHowToFaceMeteors

      void chooseHowToFaceMeteors(String player, ArrayList<Integer> howToDefenceFromShots, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows the specified player to choose how to defend against incoming meteors during the game. The choice is represented by a list of integers, where each integer refers to a specific defensive action or option.
      Specified by:
      chooseHowToFaceMeteors in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - the username of the player making the decision
      howToDefenceFromShots - a list of integers representing the player's chosen defensive actions or methods
      id - the unique identifier for the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication error during the remote method invocation

    • choosePassengersToLose

      void choosePassengersToLose(String p, boolean yOn, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> pass, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Handles the selection of passengers to be lost based on the provided parameters.
      Specified by:
      choosePassengersToLose in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      p - The identifier of the player performing the action.
      yOn - A boolean indicating whether specific game conditions are active.
      pass - A list of lists representing the passengers and their attributes.
      id - The unique identifier of the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • chooseToClaimReward

      void chooseToClaimReward(boolean yOn, String player, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose whether to claim a reward during the game.
      Specified by:
      chooseToClaimReward in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      yOn - A boolean indicating the player's decision, where true means the reward is claimed and false means it is not.
      player - The name or identifier of the player making the decision.
      id - The unique identifier of the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the invocation of this method.

    • chooseToClaimReward

      void chooseToClaimReward(boolean yOn, String player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> storageTiles, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> newGoods, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose to claim a reward during the game. This action involves providing storage tile positions and new goods that will be associated with the reward. The game server processes this request based on the provided parameters.
      Specified by:
      chooseToClaimReward in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      yOn - a boolean indicating the player's decision regarding the reward; true if they choose to claim.
      player - a String representing the player's identifier or name.
      storageTiles - an ArrayList of ArrayLists of Integers representing the storage tile positions to be used or associated with the reward.
      newGoods - an ArrayList of ArrayLists of Goods objects representing the new goods to be added when claiming the reward.
      id - a UUID uniquely identifying the game session.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error during the remote method call.

    • chooseToPlaceBatteries

      void chooseToPlaceBatteries(String p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posBatAndNumBattXPos, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows the player to choose and place batteries in specific positions during the game.
      Specified by:
      chooseToPlaceBatteries in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      p - the identifier of the player making the choice
      posBatAndNumBattXPos - a list of lists, where each inner list specifies positions and the number of batteries to place at each position
      id - the unique identifier of the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • chooseToStartFirePower

      void chooseToStartFirePower(String p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> DoubFireTriplets, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> BatteriesToAct, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Handles the player's decision to start fire power during the game.
      Specified by:
      chooseToStartFirePower in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      p - The player making the decision, represented as a string.
      DoubFireTriplets - A list of coordinates or identifiers for selected targets that will be attacked with double firepower, presented as a nested list of integers.
      BatteriesToAct - A list of coordinates or identifiers for the batteries to be activated to enable the firepower, presented as a nested list of integers.
      id - The unique identifier for the specific game instance where this action occurs.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an error during the remote method invocation.

    • chooseToStartMotor

      void chooseToStartMotor(String player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> enginesPos, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesPos, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to activate certain motors in the game, specifying their positions and the corresponding batteries needed to power them.
      Specified by:
      chooseToStartMotor in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - the name or identifier of the player making the move
      enginesPos - a list of lists containing the positions of the engines chosen by the player
      batteriesPos - a list of lists containing the positions of the batteries to power the engines
      id - the unique identifier of the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an issue with the remote method invocation

    • chooseWhereToPutGoods

      void chooseWhereToPutGoods(String player, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posGoods, ArrayList<ArrayList<Goods>> goodsSets, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to choose where to place specific goods within their storage system.
      Specified by:
      chooseWhereToPutGoods in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      player - the identifier of the player making the choice.
      posGoods - a list of positions representing where the goods can potentially be placed.
      goodsSets - a list of goods sets available to the player for placement.
      id - the unique identifier for the current game instance.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote invocation error occurs.

    • addWaitTile

      void addWaitTile(int playerID, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Adds a wait tile for the specified player in the game identified by the given UUID.
      Specified by:
      addWaitTile in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player who will have the wait tile added
      id - the unique identifier of the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote invocation error occurs

    • insertWaitTile

      void insertWaitTile(int playerID, int index, int row, int col, int rotation, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Inserts a wait tile for a specific player at the given position and orientation.
      Specified by:
      insertWaitTile in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player for whom the wait tile is being inserted
      index - the index of the tile to insert
      row - the row position where the tile is to be placed
      col - the column position where the tile is to be placed
      rotation - the rotation value of the tile
      id - the unique identifier of the game instance
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • CommandFillTile

      void CommandFillTile(int playerid, boolean wantalien, AlienColor color, int row, int col, UUID id) throws RemoteException
      Executes the command to fill a tile on the game board, possibly with an alien presence, at the specified coordinates.
      Specified by:
      CommandFillTile in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      playerid - the ID of the player executing the command
      wantalien - a flag indicating whether to place an alien in the specified tile
      color - the color of the alien to be placed, if applicable
      row - the row index of the tile to be filled
      col - the column index of the tile to be filled
      id - the unique identifier for the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related exception occurs during execution

    • activeGames

      void activeGames(UUID uuid) throws RemoteException
      Provides a way to retrieve a list of active games associated with a specific UUID. The UUID is used to identify the server or client context for the games.
      Specified by:
      activeGames in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier associated with the server or client context
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related error occurs during the RMI call

    • demoGame

      void demoGame(UUID uuid) throws RemoteException
      Demonstrates a game scenario for the specified game instance.
      Specified by:
      demoGame in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the game instance to be demonstrated
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call

    • ping

      void ping(UUID uuid, String name) throws RemoteException
      Sends a simple ping request to check the connection between the client and the server. This method is used to ensure that the remote server is reachable and responsive.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication-related exception occurs during the execution of the remote method.
